reviewtext: These work for some people's ears and not for others. One reviewer claimed that I must be either retarded or deformed since they don't work for me. That reviewer is best described by words not allowed in this venue.I'm going to replace the useless foam, others have suggested:for hunters: Silencio Super Sound Baffler earplugsfrom a pharmacy: Flents "Quiet Please"I believe you have to create the center hole in these products to retrofit them to the Koss' "stem".- Jeff
